attributes.action: Give people a legal right to own and carry a self defence pepper spray in public
attributes.additional_details:
For many years the subject of what a member of the public whether at home or elsewhere can do to defend themselves or loved ones has left people wondering what they can & can’t do.
Therefore I request that Parliament discuss this   Non lethal method of self defence and legislate it’s use without fear of prosecution when used in defence.
attributes.background: Presently in the eyes of the law there is no or a very ambiguous means of what a person can or can’t do in order to defend themselves if they come under attack

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Legalise pepper spray in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742673
